extendedInfo.description: ââWinner of the 2011 Best App Ever Awards - Casual GameONCE YOU SLICE, YOU CAN'T STOP SLICING!Silver AWARD Winner - Pocket GamerâââThis game supports English, Deutsch, franÃ§ais, EspaÃ±ol, Italiano, and æ¥æ¬èªâââFast Fun with a Geometric Flair! "Slice It!" is all about slicing shapes into fragments that are equal in size.Sound easy? It may start out that way, but soon you'll be cutting into fragments that will puzzle you like never before. Brainteasing puzzles: over 200 Basic Stages and a five-star rating system so you can play until you get it right!â â â â âNew time attack mode, âSlice it! QUICK!âTry to slice as many, as accurate, and as fast as you can in 1 minute! Also, compete with friends to get higher rankings. â â â â â200 STAGESâ¦ and growing! Each level is a new shape, and each stage has increasingly difficult fragmentation levels.In the most advanced stages, new obstacles, like line-refracting mirrors, make Slice It! the hardest puzzler out there.Get a perfect score on any level and earn a Hint! If you just can't cut it with an obstacle, all is not lost: use a Hint!You can get additional Hints, when you tap AD.Itâs time to start thinking and slicing!â â â â âWHAT THE PRESS SAYS ABOUT SLICE IT!"...if you're looking for a new type of puzzle game with a charming style that's easy to pick up and play, take a look at Slice It!" - TouchArcade.com"It may look like a toy, but youâd have to be a genius not to get stuck at some point while playing this clever, challenging game." - PocketGamer.co.uk"Simple in its shape, Slice It brings us along this game which is unpretentious but terribly addictive." - Hitphone.frââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Captivating!
reviews.comment: Brings out the long lost geometric skills, and is great fun to play it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game. .
reviews.comment: Great for my kids, they love and enjoy playing. It\'s a challenge for then in each stage and I think it\'s awesome!
reviews.author: Joanna Acevedo

reviews.title: Fun, addictive, easy
reviews.comment: Awesome game. Can\'t believe its free. Be prepared to waste some time Weeeeee
reviews.author: David Young

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent, safe puzzle game with intuitive controls and great presentation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kwill
reviews.comment: Love it love it love it, would be 5 stars if it had better instructions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can I pay for this?
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game, but I hate the ads. Please make an ad-free version in English.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant, original and addictive
reviews.comment: Brilliantly fun, completely original and very, very addictive
reviews.author: James Jolliffe

reviews.title: Time passer
reviews.comment: I love to play tis game when i am free it helps me think better i would recommand this game for everyone to download (i hope to have more hints hehehehe....) Enjoy and happy playing ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Completely addictive! Love that you don\'t have to buy the hints.  Would be 5 stars but it\'s a little bit buggy on samsung s3. Open it and it stays on loading screen or a blank screen until I restart the app.
reviews.author: Kate Lewis

reviews.title: Fun but frustrating
reviews.comment: It\'s difficult to be razor-sharp precise when the line is made of coarse chalk..!! Love the idea, though :-)
reviews.author: Vale ria

reviews.title: Nice game, but i don\'t like it running on it\'s own
reviews.comment: I don\'t buy all of the android users saying it\'s to help it load faster, that\'s BS. every time i have issues using my phone, either making a call, using the internet or using the voice recognition, i have to use task killer to kill many apps and this is always there. I haven\'t played this game in months and so i\'ve had to delete it. I don\'t trust any app that launches for no good reason.
reviews.author: James OHara

reviews.comment: This games never loads it always closes  while it is loading and the game has alredy started. You better fix it or else I will get very angry!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a fun game and good brain exercise.  I love the strategies and fun graphics
reviews.author: Michelle Lopez

reviews.title: Superb app
reviews.comment: The concept of the game is too good. And the developers have done an excellent job too.  there should be a way to improve the accuracy of the slices since unintentionally small pieces get created. Otherwise perfect app
reviews.author: Vignesh Baliga

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Really enjoy this game. Love puzzles. Gets me thinking without being too though. Graphics are cute.
reviews.author: Kassandria Hollis

reviews.title: Great! ;-)
reviews.comment: I am so impress...the game is easy and fun..i love it..5 star given!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice time passer
reviews.comment: It is designed well, starts off simple and basic to learn the skills then really gets you think about how to make the best cuts.
reviews.author: Chris Wang

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great :-) may be if you could make user accounts, more than one person can play all the levels on the same device, without hampering each other\'s achievements. How else do i allow my little nephew to enjoy this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but crashes
reviews.comment: Episode 2 stage 46 crashes every time I bounce a line off the bottom mirror. Droid RAZR running latest update as of this posting.
reviews.author: Eric Linden

reviews.title: S-s-s Slice It Up!!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this game when i first opened google play i saw this and thought this Slice It Up App was a waste of my time but now i have and its epic brilliant amazing tremendous fantastic!!!!!!! Thank you Com2:)s!!!
reviews.author: Julian Ojogwu
